10997d36-9e00-437d-8b9a-9cfedd82dffb.description: Earners of this badge have completed training and demonstrated proficiency in understanding different types of machine learning algorithms and how they can be applied. Earners will be proficient in using supervised learning techniques such as linear and logistical regression to process data and build AI solutions that solve business problems. These individuals also have a broad understanding of how to prepare data for machine learning ingestion and how to validate the model for issues.
10997d36-9e00-437d-8b9a-9cfedd82dffb.name: Machine Learning - Foundation 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Requires a minimum of 80 learning hours that cover foundation skills with a passing grade verified by badge administrators

Demonstrated application of machine learning skills via successful completion of a hands-on capstone project or project experience that applies the foundation skills (e.g., the Deloitte AI Academy™ New Hire, AI Guild program or Experienced Professionals Program)

Disclaimer: This badge has been awarded based on Deloitte’s internal, subjective criteria at the time the badge was attained by the individual. Deloitte does not make any representations that our badges guarantee quality or expertise, and they should not be relied upon as such. Use of Deloitte badges by individuals who are not currently employed by or a partner of Deloitte does not imply association between Deloitte and the individual beyond the previously administered training and assessment

5d9b80d0-3337-4cab-b556-163ee6163604.description: Earners of this badge have completed training and demonstrated proficiency in data understanding, data preparation, data analysis, and code quality. These individuals can use Python and appropriate libraries to conduct exploratory data analysis and database tools as SQL to store data, combine data sources, manipulate data, and query data. In addition, these individuals understand how to prepare data for model ingestion and machine learning.
5d9b80d0-3337-4cab-b556-163ee6163604.name: Data Engineering - Foundation 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Requires a minimum of 80 learning hours that cover foundation skills with a passing grade verified by badge administrators.

Demonstrated application of data engineering skills via successful completion of capstone or project experience that applies the foundation skills (e.g., the Deloitte AI Academy™ New Hire or Experienced Professionals Program)

Disclaimer: This badge has been awarded based on Deloitte’s internal, subjective criteria at the time the badge was attained by the individual. e77d5ed2-eb57-4a22-af8d-4716061cfe69.description: Instructors facilitated a multi-month learning program on HR business partnering, guiding participants to work with business leaders to develop talent and workforce-related solutions that enable meeting business outcomes. Instructors also coached participants to identify a real business issue and use Human-Centered Design to conduct root cause analysis, prototyping, and piloting to develop and successfully implement solutions in partnership with business leaders.
e77d5ed2-eb57-4a22-af8d-4716061cfe69.name: HR Professional Academy Master Facilitator

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully facilitated Deloitte’s HR Professional Academy of HR Business Partners;  A 16-module program which includes completing a project and working through on-demand learning content, weekly assignments, and discussions
Effectively coached participants to define a business issue and design, develop, test, and deploy a solution
Provided subject matter expertise on methods and tools to enhance HR Business Partner skills and capabilities

skills.name: Subject Matter Expertise Around HR Business Partnering
